amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: City or village in two or more counties; annexation; petition of owners; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: Whenever the owner, owners, and inhabitants or a majority thereof in number or value of any territory lying contiguous to the corporate limits of any city or village, the corporate limits of which city or village is situated in two or more counties and, whether the territory shall be situated within or without the counties of which said city or village is a part, except as provided in section 13-1115, shall desire to annex said territory to such city or village, such territory may be annexed in the manner provided in section 17-405, and when so annexed shall thereafter be a part of such city or village.
